participant_1.background:
I'm still looking for someone to share my life with.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.
I bought a ball for my dog, Toto.
I don't always remember to give my cats enough food.
my father is a preacher.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.
I'm not a good cook, but I do enjoy making Christmas dinner for my family.
I drive a pickup truck because it's perfect for hauling my skydiving gear and going off-road.
i enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing.
I drive a Jeep Wrangler because it is a rugged vehicle that is perfect for my hobbies.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
I am just relaxing at home watching a movie. What about you?
I just finished skydiving and I am exhausted!
That sounds exciting! I have never skydived before, but I would like to try it one day.
It is a lot of fun! You should definitely try it!
I will do that! What other hobbies do you have?
I also like to go off-roading and I enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing.
Off-roading sounds like fun! I have never done that before either. I like to dress up too, but I only do it for special occasions.
I love dressing up! I like to go all out and make a big statement.
You sound like a lot of fun! I would love to hang out with you sometime.
I would love to hang out with you too! We should exchange numbers and plan something.
Great! I will text you my number.
Okay! I will text you mine too.
